amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $70 million and to apply the amount to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 259 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy by $70 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 293 (Roll no. 58).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Latta amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 137 - 293 (Roll no. 58).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Latta.
